title: What is the best acoustic guitar under $1000? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best guitar is the guitar that gives you the sound and feeling you're looking for.  There's no such thing as the "best acoustic guitar" -- it all depends on what you want.  Gibson, Martin, Taylor, and other brands make great guitars, some of which you can buy (new or used) for less than $1,000.  But they all feel, sound, and play differently, and other factors also affect the sound and playability: what kind of wood is used, the type of strings you play on, how the guitar is set up, etc. I suggest visiting a good music store and trying out a bunch of different guitars.  Figure out what kind of sound you like and look for a guitar that fits.  You might find that you can buy it new for under $1,000, or you might have to buy used.  Either way, you should choose an instrument that sounds and feels great to you.

I’ve heard some great feedback about the Taylor 114ce acoustic guitar, it’s a cutaway electro/acoustic guitar, with walnut back and sides and a solid sitka spruce top… Which means it sounds great for strumming, flat-picking and finger-style playing Either-way, there are some great alternatives featured on the amazon page that I’ve linked to below, which may be more attractive.
